dcterms:description: This dataset contains multi-spectral images observed by the Sentinel-2 Constellation for the year 2018, covering the Central Valley in California, USA. It includes images for every 15 days from January to December, with a total of 24 time steps, and aims to classify various crop types.
dcterms:title: Sentinel based crop mapping for Central Valley in California, USA

dcterms:description: This dataset contains multi-spectral monthly composites from Planet Labs for a region in Benin, Africa, focusing on mapping cashew plantations, which are a significant source of income for farmers.
dcterms:title: Planet based Cashew tree-crop mapping in Benin, Africa
